content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the decision identified as iv 9592021 was issued on december 29 2021 the case involved the payment of costs with the heirs responsible for half of the total amount the procedure lasted for 9 months and 3 days the final resolution of the case involved the distribution of assets worth 600000 euros including real estate properties funds subfund units a safe shares in a company and a car the assets were divided between the son and daughter of the deceased with an agreement reached where the son received 80 shares of the company and half of the remaining assets while the daughter received the car and half of the remaining assets the text also discusses the legal principles and laws used in the decision as well as the process of lodging an appeal

metadata.cost: 1.584,00 EUR court fees with 600'000.00 EUR inheritance value
